metadata.Title: CVE-2022-46663 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
In GNU Less before 609, crafted data can result in "less -R" not filteringANSI escape sequences sent to the terminal.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-46663` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

less - 590-1ubuntu0.22.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: less package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '590-1ubuntu0.22.04.1').
